isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE, AND FENDERS - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, AND 9400 - DESCRIPTION

svcproc.title: HOOD
svcproc.para: The fiberglass hoods (except the 5000 SBA, with butterfly hood, optional after August 1994) are one-piece tilt type ( Figure 1, Figure 2, and Figure 3). The narrowed tilt fiberglass hoods on the 5000 SFA, 5000 SBA (standard after August 1994), 9100, 9200, and 9400 provide aerodynamics, while still enclosing the air cleaner.

figure.caption: Figure 1. Front End Configurations and Hood Tilt Profiles
Figure 2. Front End Configurations and Hood Tilt Profiles (Cont.)
Figure 3. Front End Configurations and Hood Tilt Profiles (Cont.)

svcproc.para: The 5000 Set-Back Axle (SBA) model has a butterfly hood, standard before August 1994, made of riveted aluminum construction. After August 1994, the butterfly hood is optional, and the top panels are made of fiberglass and the side panels are riveted aluminum construction.
